original_text: So Moses kept Miriam outside the camp for seven days. The people did not start to travel again until they had brought Miriam back into the camp again.
korean_text: 이에 미리암이 진영 밖에 이레 동안 갇혀 있었고 백성은 그를 다시 들어오게 하기까지 행진하지 아니하다가

sentences.original_text: So Moses kept Miriam outside the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세는 미리암을 진 밖에 두었습니다

sentences.original_text: The people did not start to travel again
until they had brought Miriam back
